course.title: ADM 2313 The Entrepreneurial Society (3 units)
course.desc: The entrepreneurial process and characteristics of the entrepreneur; social entrepreneurship; intrapreneurship; women and minorities in entrepreneurship; entrepreneurial failure; entrepreneurship as an economic development strategy and resulting programs and policies; steps in moving entrepreneurial endeavors forward; introduction to ideation and business planning.Course Component: LecturePrerequisite: 18 units of university-level courses
